p.em: The Jamestown Public School District is committed to maintaining a learning and working environment free from discrimination and harassment in all employment and educational programs, activities, and facilities. The District prohibits discrimination and harassment based on a student and/or employee’s race, color, religion, sex, gender identity, national origin, ancestry, disability, age or other status protected by law.

div.p:
Jamestown Public Schools PO Box 269 207 2nd Avenue Southeast Jamestown, ND 58401
